entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You obtained the RX-8 modulator from the AT-AT leg, but you were spotted by a mercenary recon team working for the Empire. You need to find these mercenaries and stop them from reporting on you.
entries.journal_entry_description: The Alliance is gathering intelligence on Imperial equipment. One of the items that it is looking at is the AT-AT. The Alliance wants to develop jamming devices that interfere with the AT-AT's locomotion. The RX-8 modulator located in the AT-AT legs seems most vulnerable to this type of attack. But the Rebels need detailed schematics of the device in order to build a functioning prototype. A leg of an AT-AT has been located at the Valarian Smuggler's Depot. You need to go there and retrieve the RX-8 modulator from it, analyze it and transmit the schematics  back to Ordo.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You need to locate, remove and analyze the RX-8 Modulator from the AT-AT leg located at the Valarian smuggler depot.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Hold on a second... I'm picking up a radio transmission from your area. It looks like you were spotted by a mercenary recon team. You have to intercept this team before they reach the Imperial outpost at Bestine and report on what you were doing.
